response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe is an exceptional value at $1,200,000. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its unique features and benefits, we are confident it will significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Considering its intrinsic value and the potential it holds, we are extending this exclusive offer to you. We kindly request your consideration and look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
